name: jChat
tagline: This is a real time LAN Chat application developed using Node.js
body:
### Welcome Buddy!
Download the project and make sure that you have Node.js installed. Use the package.json to install the required modules by running the command:
`npm install`

Run the index.js by giving the command 
`node index.js`

Open up your browser and type in : [http://localhost:8000](http://localhost:8000) and at the same time ask your friends on your LAN to point their browser to the above URL.

And Enjoy Chatting!
